description:
All your chats in one app. Yes, really.

A single app to chat on iMessage, WhatsApp, and 13 other chat networks. You can search, snooze, or archive messages. And with a unified inbox, youâ€™ll never miss a message again.
Fixed & Improved
Fixed issues logging into most chat accounts
Fixed starting a New Chat with people not in your contacts
Fixed database migration that in rare cases could cause the app not to open
